Uses of Class
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.Communities

Packages that use Communities 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community
Definitions for the community structure of a network.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.clustering
Clustering approaches.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.detection
Definitions for community detection algorithms.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.detection.connectedness
Community detection algorithm based on the connectedness of the nodes.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.detection.modularity
Modularity-based community detection approaches.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.detection.modularity.balanced
Community detection algorithms attempting to balance the community size.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.graph
Generators for creating community reduced networks (nodes are the communities in the network and edges represent links between users in different communities).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.community.io
Classes for reading and writing community structure from files.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.prediction.metrics
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for link prediction metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.prediction.metrics.accuracy
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for accuracy link prediction metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.metrics
Classes and interfaces for cofiguration files for evaluation metrics for contact recommendation.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.metrics.accuracy
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for accuracy evaluation metrics for contact recommendation.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.metrics.novdiv
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for novelty and diversity evaluation metrics for contact recommendation.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for contact recommendation rerankers.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.local
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for local contact recommendation rerankers.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.local.communities
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for local contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.edge
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on edge metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on graph metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph.comms.gini.degree
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on applying the Gini index over the distribution of the degree of the communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph.comms.gini.degree.sizenorm
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on applying the Gini index over the distribution of the degree of the communities (normalizing by community size).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph.comms.gini.edge
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on applying the Gini index over the distribution of the number of edges between pairs of communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.links.recommendation.rerankers.swap.graph.comms.gini.edge.sizenorm
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for global contact recommendation rerankers enhacing structural properties based on applying the Gini index over the distribution of the number of edges between pairs of communities (normalizing by community size).
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.algorithms.standalone.randomwalk
Contact recommendation algorithms based on random walks.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.features  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.communities
Rerankers for enhancing global properties of the network related to communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.local.communities
Generalizations of local rerankers, which allow processing several users in a row.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.swap.comm
Rerankers that optimize global properties of the network related to the communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.swap.comm.gini.degree  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.swap.comm.gini.degree.sizenormalized  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.swap.comm.gini.edge  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.swap.comm.gini.edge.sizenormalized  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.local.communities
Rerankers that locally enhance community related metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics
Social network analysis metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.graph
Social network analysis global communities graph metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.graph.gini.degree  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.graph.gini.degree.sizenormalized  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.graph.gini.edges
Metrics for computing the community edge Gini of the graph, i.e. the Gini coefficient for the number of edges between each pair of communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.graph.gini.edges.dice
Metrics for computing the Dice community edge Gini of the graph, i.e. the Gini coefficient over the pairs of communities in the graph, where the frequency is the relation between the real number of edges between communities, and the number of edges between communities in a configuration network where the link degree distributions are equivalent to the ones in the studied network.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.graph.gini.edges.sizenormalized
Metrics for computing the size normalized community edge Gini of the graph, i.e. the Gini coefficient for the number of edges in the graph, divided by the maximum number of possible links between the endpoint communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.graph.gini.size  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.communities.indiv
Social network analysis individual communities graph metrics.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.complementary
Social network analysis metrics over the complementary graph.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.metrics.distance
Distance-based metrics.
